name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a results-driven Senior Frontend Engineer with 8+ years of software engineering experience, I specialize in creating high-quality applications using **Angular**, **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **HTML**, and **CSS**. I am proficient in developing and optimizing user-centric frontend solutions while ensuring accessibility compliance. My technical expertise also includes cloud services such as **AWS**, as well as establishing seamless **REST Web Services** for enhanced application performance. I am adept at utilizing version control with **Git** and implementing **CI/CD** pipelines to streamline development processes. Additionally, my background in **Python** development, including frameworks such as **FastAPI**, **Django**, and **Flask**, equips me with a comprehensive understanding of backend systems, further enhancing my ability to deliver cohesive and efficient solutions. My experience extends to working with microservices architecture and coordinating efforts throughout the software development lifecycle using tools like **Jira**.

• Managed source control and versioning using **Git**, streamlining collaborations and code reviews among a team of 10+ engineers.

• Ensured compliance with industry standards including **Accessibility Compliance** and security practices, optimizing the application for diverse user needs.

• Mentored junior developers on best practices for **TypeScript**, enhancing code quality and maintainability in ongoing projects.

• Championed responsive design principles using **HTML** and **CSS** to ensure compatibility across devices and accessibility for all users.
• Participated in code reviews and provided constructive feedback, resulting in reduced bugs and improved application performance by **30%**.
• Collaborated closely with backend teams to integrate **natural language understanding** capabilities into front-end applications, enhancing user interactions with intelligent functionalities.
• Maintained an agile development process, adapting quickly to changes and delivering features consistently within sprints.
